mapper.select: SELECT m.meal_no as mealNo, meal_title as mealTitle, meal_time as mealTime, nutri_energy as nutriEnergy, nutri_carbohydrate as nutriCarbohydrate, nutri_protein as nutriProtein, nutri_total_fatty_acids as nutriTotalFattyAcids FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE meal_reg_date = #{mealRegDate} AND user_no = #{userNo} AND meal_time != 'WATER'

SELECT m.meal_no AS mealNo, meal_reg_date AS mealRegDate, meal_time AS mealTime, meal_title AS mealTitle, meal_content AS mealContent, SUM(f.nutri_energy) AS energy, SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_sugar) AS sugar, SUM(f.nutri_dietary_fiber) AS dietaryFiber, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_ash) AS ash, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_saturated_fats) AS saturatedFats, SUM(f.nutri_monounsaturated_fats + f.nutri_polyunsaturated_fats) AS unsaturatedFats, SUM(f.nutri_water) AS water, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_a_carotene) AS vitaminACarotene, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_b1) AS vitaminB1, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_b2) AS vitaminB2, SUM(f.nutri_niacin) AS niacin, SUM(f.nutri_folate) AS folate, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_c) AS vitaminC, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_d) AS vitaminD, SUM(f.nutri_cholesterol) AS cholesterol, SUM(f.nutri_sodium) AS sodium, SUM(f.nutri_calcium) AS calcium, SUM(f.nutri_iron) AS iron, SUM(f.nutri_phosphorus) AS phosphorus, SUM(f.nutri_potassium) AS potassium FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND meal_reg_date = #{mealRegDate} GROUP BY mealNo, mealRegDate, mealTime, mealTitle, meal_content

SELECT f.food_code AS foodCode, food_amount AS foodAmount, food_name AS foodName, food_sub_group AS foodSubGroup, (food_weight * food_amount) as foodWeight, (nutri_energy * food_amount) as nutriEnergy, (nutri_carbohydrate * food_amount) as nutriCarbohydrate, (nutri_protein * food_amount) as nutriProtein, (nutri_total_fatty_acids * food_amount) as nutriTotalFattyAcids
FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.meal_no = #{mealNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal (user_no, meal_reg_date, meal_time, meal_title, meal_content) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{mealRegDate}, #{mealTime}, #{mealTitle}, #{mealContent})
INSERT INTO meal_food (meal_no, food_code, food_amount) VALUES ( #{mealNo}, #{foodCode}, #{foodAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT food_code AS foodCode, food_name AS foodName, food_sub_group AS foodSubGroup FROM food WHERE food_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{foodName}, '%')

SELECT food_code AS foodCode, food_name AS foodName, food_sub_group AS foodSubGroup, food_weight AS foodWeight, nutri_energy AS nutriEnergy, nutri_carbohydrate AS nutriCarbohydrate, nutri_protein AS nutriProtein, nutri_total_fatty_acids AS nutriTotalFattyAcids FROM food WHERE food_code = #{foodCode};
mapper.update: UPDATE meal SET meal_reg_date = '2025-06-21', meal_time = '', meal_title = '', meal_content = '' WHERE meal_no = #{mealNo};
mapper.select: SELECT m.meal_no as mealNo, meal_title as mealTitle, (food_amount * food_weight) as foodAmount FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE meal_time = 'WATER' AND user_no = #{userNo} AND meal_reg_date = #{mealRegDate}

SELECT meal_reg_date AS reportDate, SUM(f.nutri_energy) AS energy, SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_sugar) AS sugar, SUM(f.nutri_dietary_fiber) AS dietaryFiber, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_ash) AS ash, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_saturated_fats) AS saturatedFats, SUM(f.nutri_monounsaturated_fats + f.nutri_polyunsaturated_fats) AS unsaturatedFats, SUM(f.nutri_water) AS water, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_a_carotene) AS vitaminACarotene, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_b1) AS vitaminB1, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_b2) AS vitaminB2, SUM(f.nutri_niacin) AS niacin, SUM(f.nutri_folate) AS folate, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_c) AS vitaminC, SUM(f.nutri_vitamin_d) AS vitaminD, SUM(f.nutri_cholesterol) AS cholesterol, SUM(f.nutri_sodium) AS sodium, SUM(f.nutri_calcium) AS calcium, SUM(f.nutri_iron) AS iron, SUM(f.nutri_phosphorus) AS phosphorus, SUM(f.nutri_potassium) AS potassium FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND meal_reg_date = #{mealRegDate} GROUP BY meal_reg_date

SELECT meal_reg_date AS reportDate, SUM(f.nutri_energy) AS energy, SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_water) AS water FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY meal_reg_date ORDER BY meal_reg_date

SELECT AVG(energy) AS avgWeeklyEnergy, AVG(carbohydrate) AS avgWeeklycarbohydrate, AVG(protein) AS avgWeeklyProtein, AVG(totalFattyAcids) AS avgWeeklyTotalFattyAcids, AVG(water) AS avgWeeklyWater FROM ( SELECT SUM(f.nutri_energy) AS energy, SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_water) AS water FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(m.meal_reg_date) ) AS daily_totals

SELECT ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'BREAKFAST' THEN f.nutri_energy ELSE NULL END), 2) AS avgBreakfastEnergy, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'LUNCH' THEN f.nutri_energy ELSE NULL END), 2) AS avgLunchEnergy, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'DINNER' THEN f.nutri_energy ELSE NULL END), 2) AS avgDinnerEnergy FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND CURDATE()

SELECT weekday AS reportWeekday, AVG(energy) AS energy, AVG(carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, AVG(protein) AS protein, AVG(totalFattyAcids) AS totalFattyAcids, AVG(water) AS water FROM ( SELECT DATE(m.meal_reg_date) AS date, DAYNAME(m.meal_reg_date) AS weekday, SUM(f.nutri_energy) AS energy, SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_water) AS water FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 29 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(m.meal_reg_date) ) AS daily_totals GROUP BY weekday ORDER BY FIELD(weekday, 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday')

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'BREAKFAST' THEN 1 END) AS breakfastCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'LUNCH' THEN 1 END) AS lunchCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN m.meal_time = 'DINNER' THEN 1 END) AS dinnerCount FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURDATE()

SELECT AVG(carbohydrate) AS avgMonthlycarbohydrate, AVG(protein) AS avgWeeklyProtein, AVG(totalFattyAcids) AS avgWeeklyTotalFattyAcids, AVG(sodium) AS avgMonthlySodium, AVG(sugar) AS avgMonthlySugar FROM ( SELECT SUM(f.nutri_carbohydrate) AS carbohydrate, SUM(f.nutri_protein) AS protein, SUM(f.nutri_total_fatty_acids) AS totalFattyAcids, SUM(f.nutri_sugar) AS sugar, SUM(f.nutri_sodium) AS sodium FROM meal m JOIN meal_food mf ON m.meal_no = mf.meal_no JOIN food f ON mf.food_code = f.food_code WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND m.meal_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(m.meal_reg_date) ) AS daily_totals
